name: Tiny Theme Park Tycoon
description:
Tiny Theme Park Tycoon is a theme park managing game for those who are new to the genre.

You are The Manager. An entrepreneur starting his/her very own 10x10 amusement park for people to enjoy. Build attractions and install food stalls so you can tinker with service prices according to the weather. Hire janitors and mechanics to keep your park running. Look at all kinds of fancy diagrams to tell what your visitors may need next. Make your childhood dreams come true with a theme park bringing 6 digit profits to the house.

Key Features:

  • 5 upgradable attractions to build.
  • 3 kind of buffets to install.
  • Lots of different diagrams telling you what visitors need next.
  • Collect extra tips from happy visitors.
  • 2 Leaderboards for keeping the park running the longest and also for maxing it out the fastest!

Game length: 30-60 minutes depending how fast you play and how well you manage it.
